})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-03 02:35:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7a1bb689070f1010292ef4be7c1ed059</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Append CI to Description</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Homework Assignment" source="x_163425_homework">4cdce13007031010292ef4be7c1ed055</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Homework Assignment">4cdce13007031010292ef4be7c1ed055</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7a1bb689070f1010292ef4be7c1ed059</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-03 02:35:21</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7a1bb689070f1010292ef4be7c1ed059"/></record_update>
